summary: Do OpenStreetMapRendererInfo as an interface instead of an enum

comments.content:
That will allow it to be extensible.

See also http://groups.google.com/group/osmdroid/browse_thread/thread/50b9fdf48ec45aeb
Issue 82 has been merged into this issue.
This issue was closed by revision r354.

I also created an app that uses a custom renderer:
http://code.google.com/p/savage-router/
